entities.name: arry
entities.description: The name 'arry is mentioned as a nickname for Harry Potter. It is used by Fleur Delacour when she greets him.

entities.name: fleur delacour
entities.description: Fleur Delacour is introduced as the one who brought up the tray and greeted Harry with a kiss on each cheek. She mentions her sister Gabrielle talking about Harry Potter.

entities.name: gabrielle delacour
entities.description: Gabrielle Delacour is mentioned as Fleur's sister who talks about Harry Potter nonstop.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs Weasley is introduced as the one who was revealed bobbing along behind Fleur. She looks rather cross and mentions that they hadn't got around to telling Harry about something yet.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as the person being greeted by Fleur Delacour and talked about by Gabrielle Delacour.

relationships.description: Fleur Delacour greets Harry Potter with a kiss on each cheek.
Fleur Delacour mentions her sister Gabrielle talking about Harry Potter nonstop.
Mrs Weasley is related to Harry Potter, but the exact nature of their relationship is not specified in this context.
